articles.description: Looking for something to show off the power of your new Xbox Series X|S console? Check out our top five best Xbox Series X|S optimised games available on next-gen consoles.

articles.author: Dion Dassanayake
articles.title: Don’t panic: WhatsApp is not dropping support for your Android and iOS smartphones in 2021 - Daily Express
articles.description: WHATSAPP fans have recently been warned that the chat app could stop working on their phone in 2021. However, there's one thing Android and iOS users need to know about this alert.
